name: Afterlife (itch) (Groog32)
description:
Ever wondered where do non-player characters go after you kill them in games?

The answer is they go to the special kind of Hell, falling deeper and deeper through floors of monsters trying to reach the bottom to respawn back into the game.

Compete for leadership in High Score global rankings in this endless vertical runner game. Jump, shoot, destroy blocks and enemies as you travel to the depth of Hell. Pick-up new weapons and skills to aid you along the way, and manage your ammo reserve, as it only refreshes when you land on a block.

Controls:
